snippet: In response to a column by Frank Bruni criticizing him, Robert F. Kennedy Jr. argues that steps need to be taken to improve vaccine safety.
abstract: Letter from Robert F Kennedy Jr comments on July 5 Frank Bruni Op-Ed column discussing controversy over thimerosal, mercury-containing preservative found in some American vaccines.
lead_paragraph: In response to a column by Frank Bruni criticizing him, Robert F. Kennedy Jr. argues that steps need to be taken to improve vaccine safety.

headline.print_headline: Robert F. Kennedy Jr., on Mercury in Vaccines
headline.main: Robert F. Kennedy Jr., on Mercury in Vaccines

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
